channel.title: Dhruva Gole on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Dhruva Gole on My New Hugo Site

item.title: GDB
item.description: GDB for Noobs Why use a debugger? Most of us tend to have bugs in our code. We could use printing commands to test our code, or we could use a debugger. Many times our code might seem to work correctly, because we didn’t test it under enough scenarios. Other times we know there’s a bug, but by just reading the code we don’t notice it is there. Thus, we should develop a habit of launching a debugger when we get into trouble.

item.title: GSoC2021
item.description: GSoC2021: Bela support for BeagleBone AI Bela is a hardware and software system for creating beautiful interaction with sensors and sound. This project proposes to provide restructuring and improvement of existing Bela Software Code to allow for compatibility and easier transition to newer TI chips (like in the BBAI).
